summary: Implements the SEAL (Subgraph Extraction and Labeling) framework for link prediction on OGB graph datasets using DGL and PyTorch, providing data loading, subgraph sampling, configurable GNN encoders, training/evaluation loops, and lightweight logging utilities.
business_intent: Offer a ready‑to‑run reference implementation that enables researchers and engineers to benchmark and develop graph neural network based link‑prediction models, facilitating reproducible experiments and performance comparison on large-scale graph data.
